titleStmt.title: The uncharitable informer charitably informed, that sycophancy is a sin, pernicious to all, but most of all to himself. By Faithfull Teate, minister of the Gospel of peace and truth.
titleStmt.author: Teate, Faithful, b. 1621.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by William Bladen, by order,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
